Diploma.PLO1: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of core concepts and principles in the discipline.
Diploma.PLO2: Apply basic cognitive skills to identify, classify, and explain common problems.
Diploma.PLO3: Perform routine practical and technical tasks with supervision.
Diploma.PLO4: Demonstrate basic interpersonal skills in group or peer-supported settings.
Diploma.PLO5: Communicate simple ideas clearly in oral or written form.
Diploma.PLO6: Use basic digital tools and technologies relevant to the field.
Diploma.PLO7: Apply simple numeracy skills to perform measurements or basic calculations.
Diploma.PLO8: Demonstrate emerging leadership behaviours in guided activities.
Diploma.PLO9: Demonstrate personal responsibility, punctuality, and self-management.
Diploma.PLO10: Apply basic entrepreneurial thinking in simple or routine tasks.
Diploma.PLO11: Demonstrate awareness of ethical issues and follow basic codes of conduct.

Degree.PLO1: Apply advanced discipline-specific knowledge to solve theoretical and applied problems.
Degree.PLO2: Analyse information critically and apply cognitive reasoning for decision-making.
Degree.PLO3: Perform a wide range of practical and technical tasks independently.
Degree.PLO4: Demonstrate effective interpersonal and collaborative teamwork skills.
Degree.PLO5: Communicate effectively with clarity using discipline-appropriate formats.
Degree.PLO6: Use digital tools competently for data management, analysis, and communication.
Degree.PLO7: Apply quantitative reasoning and numeracy in problem solving.
Degree.PLO8: Demonstrate leadership skills in team settings or project environments.
Degree.PLO9: Demonstrate personal resilience, self-regulation, and professional responsibility.
Degree.PLO10: Demonstrate entrepreneurial thinking, creativity, or innovation in applied contexts.
Degree.PLO11: Apply ethical principles and comply with professional standards of practice.

Master.PLO1: Integrate advanced and specialized knowledge to address complex problems.
Master.PLO2: Evaluate and synthesise information using higher-order cognitive reasoning.
Master.PLO3: Execute advanced practical, technical, or research-based procedures with autonomy.
Master.PLO4: Demonstrate high-level interpersonal competencies in multidisciplinary contexts.
Master.PLO5: Communicate complex ideas effectively to specialist and non-specialist audiences.
Master.PLO6: Innovatively apply digital tools, analytics, and emerging technologies.
Master.PLO7: Apply advanced quantitative or statistical techniques in decision-making.
Master.PLO8: Demonstrate adaptive leadership and manage complex team or project functions.
Master.PLO9: Demonstrate high levels of self-direction, professional integrity, and resilience.
Master.PLO10: Generate innovative or entrepreneurial solutions for professional practice.
Master.PLO11: Evaluate ethical dilemmas and make principled judgments in complex situations.

PhD.PLO1: Contribute new knowledge through original research in the discipline.
PhD.PLO2: Critically evaluate theories and develop new conceptual frameworks.
PhD.PLO3: Execute advanced, independent research with methodological rigour.
PhD.PLO4: Lead collaborative research or professional teams across diverse contexts.
PhD.PLO5: Disseminate scholarly work effectively through high-impact communication.
PhD.PLO6: Develop or apply advanced digital innovations to support research or professional practice.
PhD.PLO7: Apply advanced statistical or quantitative models to generate new insights.
PhD.PLO8: Demonstrate strategic leadership in research, industry, or academic settings.
PhD.PLO9: Exemplify the highest standards of personal autonomy, self-regulation, and responsibility.
PhD.PLO10: Lead the creation of entrepreneurial, innovative, or translational outputs.
PhD.PLO11: Exemplify ethical leadership and uphold the highest standards of research integrity.

Diploma.PEO1: Graduates demonstrate basic professional competencies for entry-level roles.
Diploma.PEO2: Graduates uphold basic ethical and humane values in simple professional contexts.
Diploma.PEO3: Graduates contribute positively to society through basic entrepreneurial awareness.
Diploma.PEO4: Graduates communicate effectively at foundational professional levels.
Diploma.PEO5: Graduates develop personal and teamwork skills required for workplace success.

Degree.PEO1: Graduates demonstrate competence in applying knowledge and skills in their field.
Degree.PEO2: Graduates uphold ethical, humane, and professional values in practice.
Degree.PEO3: Graduates contribute to societal well-being and sustainable development initiatives.
Degree.PEO4: Graduates communicate effectively across disciplines and communities.
Degree.PEO5: Graduates demonstrate leadership, teamwork, and continuous personal growth.

Master.PEO1: Graduates advance specialized knowledge and skills in their profession.
Master.PEO2: Graduates demonstrate ethical judgment and responsibility in complex situations.
Master.PEO3: Graduates lead socio-economic and sustainability-focused initiatives.
Master.PEO4: Graduates communicate effectively as experts in their discipline.
Master.PEO5: Graduates lead teams and pursue lifelong learning as reflective practitioners.

PhD.PEO1: Graduates contribute frontier knowledge through original research.
PhD.PEO2: Graduates exemplify ethical and humanistic values at the highest level.
PhD.PEO3: Graduates provide leadership in sustainable and societal transformation.
PhD.PEO4: Graduates communicate advanced scholarly and professional work globally.
PhD.PEO5: Graduates lead research teams and commit to lifelong scholarly development.
